From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Wheeljack::

         Wheeljack saw Reptilica and Bloodystrike coming.

         "Well, there you are.  Anyway, this is the gun.  I call it the
inflator.  It's used against anything organic, and can bring a bot to
instant death if they are in beast mode, which should make other bots more
cautious when travelling alone in beast mode.  Anyway, we'll get to the
parts in a minute, first, you should know about the energy it takes.  It has
a limited supply of the energy.  First take this kind of liquid," Wheeljack
grabbed some more of it off a shelf, "And then you have to use a special
electricity source.  I'll give you this device, it'll cover the electricity
sources," He handed Reptilica the device, "Then, you just take the liquid,
pour it into the gun, and use the device," He said, and handed the liquid
jar to Bloodystrike,"But first, you have to make the gun, obviously.
Anyway, to make the gun......(blablablablabla)," Wheeljack explained
everything to them.  After that, he went back to his little desk.  He put
his feet up on it, sat back and relaxed.
